website_summaries.verdict: Plantation feel in dark cherry or oak.
pros: Doors swing open fully for access

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It's not top of the line material or construction but it looks ok and seems sturdy. There was a smell to it - I think from the finish - but that's dissipated now. I took off a star because one of the panels backing the door came off but I actually think it looks better like that so took the panel off the other door. (There's a thin wood panel nailed in behind the door grid - if you take it out the grid become open instead of blocked.) Also, with the panels gone I didn't need to install the handles (since I can just grab the door) so left them off for a sleeker look).
customer_reviews.author: mhp_1Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Console
customer_reviews.text: So pretty, and not hard to put together. Just attach the legs, bottom shelf and knobs, and you have a good looking console. It is a solid piece of furniture that looks more expensive than what I paid for it. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Bird

customer_reviews.title: Well built, easy to assembled, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome. It's sturdy and well built. It's so easy to assembled, I am pleasantly surprised that the top part is already assembled. I only needed to attach 4 legs and the bottom base. Took less than 30 min to do. They did a superb job packaging it too to prevent any damage.
customer_reviews.author: ridwant

customer_reviews.title: Exactly Right
customer_reviews.text: This lovely sideboard was exactly as described and shown, was easy to assemble, and serves the intended purpose perfectly. It is also quite sturdy, the doors work perfectly, and there is plenty of storage. I am very pleased with it and it looks very nice in my dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful sidebar, exactly as descibed and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described and beautiful. It was also easier to put together than most. The cabinet came in one piece, you only had to install the legs and bottom shelf.
customer_reviews.author: john g.

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in TERRIBLE condition - 3 badly damaged corners and 2 sides all scratched up. And no refund! Would definitely not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: nice piece for the price however
customer_reviews.text: nice piece for the price however, I bought when it was on sale. It did arrive with some damage but not enough to worry about. Easy to put together. The doors have a removeable piece if you want to expose the inside of the cabinet. Pretty nice finish.
customer_reviews.author: CDGBA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - just as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece and surprisingly quick and easy to assemble - alone -! I thought by description the wood would be a little lighter in color, but it is indeed as pictured. The front design is a wicker type of material to create the 'tyed' look. I am using as a furniture piece instead of a sofa table because I wanted something taller and it is perfect! (not as a buffet - which would be a small buffet). It attractive and classy looking and mixes well with transitional decor'!
customer_reviews.author: ssl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this product. It arrived packaged very well so no damage was done, and I was able to put it together by myself! It holds my microwave, a fruit bowl on top, misc small appliances and Tupperware in the cupboards and cookbooks on the bottom. It's well built and looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: NYNichole

customer_reviews.title: Great server
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this buffet server because it looked like it would go with our Tommy Bahamas decor. It goes so well with our dining table it actually matches the color perfectly. I'm very happy I ordered this. It's as strong as it's pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Kitti

customer_reviews.title: What you see, is what you get!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful, sturdy piece. It arrived promptly and I am very pleased with it. Great value. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dawne Weis

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this. Seems like good quality. Nice color, and perfect size for our living room! Easy to put together, although it was missing the instructions. Very well packed so arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece of furniture! Color is perfect with my table and china cabinet. My boyfriend didn't have any problems putting it together but did take some time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful accent in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Cleared up the clutter in my cabinets. A beautiful accent in my kitchen. I have received a lot of complements.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Manion

customer_reviews.title: Love Our Bayberry Console Table
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in great condition and assembly went very smooth and outcome is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Jones

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to assemble! it looks beautiful like it should have cost much more than it did. i bought baskets to go underneath and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: skibum531

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible. Not as described
customer_reviews.text: This is not the color shown. It is much lighter which was disapointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Jaggers

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured and FREE shipping!!!
customer_reviews.text: Initially saw this sideboard on Joss & Main, but they wanted to charge a ridiculous shipping/handling fee for it. So i Googled and found it on Amazon through BEYOND Stores retailer and they had FREE shipping! It was shipped out promptly and arrived weeks before the estimated arrival date from Amazon. When it arrived it was packaged well and no pieces were damaged. Assembly was pretty easy, but we did have trouble getting a couple of the leg screws in since the holes were not perfectly aligned. It looks awesome assembled, just like the picture shown! I would totally recommend this piece to others.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and was very well packed so as not to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is what I thought it would be. Looks nice and was very well packed so as not to have any damage during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

product_meta.title: Hillsdale Furniture Bayberry Server, Cherry
product_meta.description: Color:CherryThe Hillsdale Furniture Bayberry server makes an excellent sideboard or buffet. Its rich Dark Cherry finish is complemented by interlocking woven wood embellishments on the door fronts and blends beautifully with any décor. Features two doors and fixed bottom shelf , as well as ample counter space so you can serve and store in style. Assembly required
feature_bullets: Transitional and decorative wood server with interlocking, woven wood door fronts, perfect for use in your dining room as a sideboard or buffet
The Two-door cabinet and fixed bottom shelf make it easy to organize nearly any room of your house
The Rich Dark Cherry finish adds class and understated, upscale style to any kitchen, dining room or home bar
Crafted from solid woods and climate-controlled wood composites
Dust and polish with non-abrasive cleaners

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars21 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
